guest.name: Shishir Mehrotra
guest.title: Co-founder & CEO
guest.background: Shishir is the co-founder and CEO of Coda. Previously, he served as VP of Product and Engineering at YouTube for six years and spent six years at Microsoft. He also sits on the board of Spotify and is known for his first-principles thinking on product and team culture.
guest.background_zh: Shishir Mehrotra 是 Coda 的联合创始人兼 CEO。在此之前，他曾在 Google 担任 YouTube 产品、工程和设计副总裁长达六年，并曾在微软工作六年。他也是 Spotify 的董事会成员，以在产品和团队文化方面的第一性原理思维而闻名。

episodeSummary: Shishir Mehrotra joins Lenny to discuss deep frameworks for product strategy, growth, and team building. He breaks down Coda's unique "Black Loop vs. Blue Loop" growth model, introduces "Eigenquestions" as a tool for high-stakes decision-making, and shares his "PSHE" framework for evaluating product talent. The conversation also covers the importance of named rituals in company culture and why reference checks trump interview signals.
episodeSummary_zh: Shishir Mehrotra 与 Lenny 深入探讨了产品战略、增长和团队建设的框架。他详细拆解了 Coda 独特的“黑色回路与蓝色回路”增长模型，介绍了用于关键决策的“本征问题（Eigenquestions）”思维工具，并分享了用于评估产品人才的“PSHE”模型。对话还涵盖了命名仪式在公司文化中的重要性，以及为什么背景调查的价值远高于面试信号。
